Package de.oth.blocklib.entities.worldItems

Class WorldItemManager

java.lang.Object
de.oth.blocklib.entities.worldItems.WorldItemManager
public class WorldItemManager
extends java.lang.Object
Class which holds all items lying in the world
Author:
Jeremy Probst, Christoph Weidner, Sven Kalle

      public java.util.List<WorldItem> pickupItemsOnNpcPositionAndAddToInventory​(Npc npc)
      Pick up all Items around the Npc. Add to NPC Inventory and remove from World.
      Parameters:
      npc - current Npc
      Returns:
      List return all pick up Items

      Returns:
